metadata.subject: Luneau de Boisjermain, Pierre Joseph François, 1732-1801
Bureau de l'abonnement littéraire
metadata.title: Avis du Bureau de l'abonnement littéraire
metadata.creator: Bureau de l'abonnement littéraire
Bureau de l'abonnement littéraire
Delaguette, Catherine, active 1788-1812, printer
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de la veuve Delaguette, rue de la Vieille-Draperie
metadata.description: "Ce Bureau est actuellement rue de Condé, no. 8, depuis le 3 octobre 1788"--P. [1]
Lists several works published in 1789 and one to be published at the end of October 1789
Includes listings for several works by Bureau director Pierre Joseph François Luneau de Boisjermain
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Text extends off of the edge of the page. Text may be lost in the binding. Permanent creases may obscure some text. Title page and cover are combined.
